item.title: Fudge
item.description: Fudge Adapted from the Royal Hostess Ingredients 150g flour 60ml cold water 350g sugar 385g tin condensed milk 5 ml vanilla Combine all ingredients in a large copper-bottomed pot and stir on medium-low heat until dissolved. Boil mixture until the soft ball stage and the mixture has a deeper colour and has thickened conspicuously. This may take ~ 20 minutes. Add vanilla and stir vigourously to combine - beware of splashes.
